issues.description: The problem specification (UML and description) defines calculateRemainingOrderNumber() as returning an int, but in the solution implementation the method is declared void. This return‚Äêtype mismatch will confuse students when they try to follow the UML and write a method signature that returns an int.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the signature of calculateRemainingOrderNumber() in SealSaloon.java to return an int (e.g., public int calculateRemainingOrderNumber()) and have it return the number of remaining orders instead of printing them.
